post:
Webhosting.uk.com is offering the most efficient full fledged VPS hosting platform in the most affordable prices. These virtual private servers are no less than dedicated servers in terms of speed and performance and resources offered. The Linux VPS hosting platform is powered by Virtuozzo technology and they are established on Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers that ensure optimum performance and better flexibility. Whereas the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V that ensures complete efficiency and uptime of the website. Both the Linux and Windows VPS hosting platforms are perfect for managing large websites and installing third party applications.

  • Virtuozzo
  • Full Root SSH Access
  • 2 Dedicated IP's
  • Redundant Hotswap Servers
  • Database Support
  • Monthly Price : £ 18 GBP
